text.0:
As the new lockdown rules come into force across England, our readers have asked us to explain what this means for childcare arrangements.

https://t.co/LhkBXmWLPI
text.1:
We support the OSR's call for greater transparency of data related to Covid-19.

The public does not owe decision makers their trust. That trust must be earned.

Proper transparency, particularly about the data used for decision making, is crucial to this. https://t.co/uruAYabzPM
